title: Who invented laser listening technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Laser Microphone History The earliest recording of a "Laser" microphone is by an inventor named Léon Theremin in the Soviet Union at or before 1947. He created something named the Buran eavesdropping system which essentially used an low powered infra-red beam to detect vibrations made by sound-waves. He demonstrated this device on a pane of glass.
I believe that Theremin is credited with it, but it may have been around before him.
